name: Saving Lives
description:
Saving Lives is an action-adventure and educational RPG game, where you play as a young adventurer who embarks on a quest to rescue the daughter of the village chief and bring peace back to the chief's family.


Credit goes to:

  • Yanfly,
  • Galv,
  • HIME
  • and others

 for very useful plugins. Not to forget RPG Maker MV and Kadokawa Corporation for the awesome resources.
